nkfust.selab.android.explorer.layout.processer

Class SetScreenSize

  • java.lang.Object
    • nkfust.selab.android.explorer.layout.processer.SetScreenSize

  • public class SetScreenSize
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is set specific view size in the content page.

    This usage:

    • First must set content page size use "setContentSize(int Height, int Width)" function, and specific view size use "setDataViewSize(int Height, int Width)" function.
    • Second used to "set(Context context, View aView, Boolean isFullScreen)" function set specific view size.
    Author:
    Zi-Xiang Lin

      • set

        public static void set(android.content.Context context,

       java.lang.Boolean isFullScreen)
        This function is set specific view size in the content page.
        Parameters:
        context - The context is a Activity parent.
        aView - The aView is specific view.
        isFullScreen - The isFullScreen is judge content page whether full screen.

      • setDataViewSize

        public static void setDataViewSize(int Height,
                   int Width)
        This function is set specific view original size.
        Parameters:
        Height - The specific view original height.
        Width - The specific view original width.

      • setContentSize

        public static void setContentSize(int Height,
                  int Width)
        This function is set content page current size.
        Parameters:
        Height - The content page current height.
        Width - The content page current width.
